sourcesContent:
import { Link } from "react-router-dom" import { Star, Users, Clock, BookOpen } from "lucide-react" const CourseCard = ({ course }) => { const getImageSrc = () => { if (!course.image) { return "/online-learning-platform.png" } // Handle base64 images if (course.image.startsWith("data:image/")) { return course.image } // Handle regular URLs return course.image } const handleImageError = (e) => { e.target.src = "/public/python-data-science-course.png" } return (
{course.level}
{course.category}

{course.title}

{course.description}

{course.studentsCount?.toLocaleString() || 0}
{course.duration}
{course.lessonsCount} lessons
{course.rating} ({course.reviewsCount})
{course.instructor?.name}
${course.price} {course.originalPrice && ( ${course.originalPrice} )}
Enroll Now
) } export default CourseCard
